title: Bold-Blocky Font Needed
content:
I am trying to find a good font type that quite modern, big, Bold, Very Blocky and can get along with some script font type. Also, it can get along with photography/cc cover design (this is magazine spread project)

I am quite bored using helvetica and universe :(
author: Avalon

comments.content: How modern should it be? When I hear modern, big and blocky I think of something like [Morgan Big](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214164452/http:/www.felicianotypefoundry.com/main/?page_id=18). Too modern?
Have a look at [this great list of Extra Bold, Ultra Black Fonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20150214164452/http:/www.fontshop.com/fontfeed/archives/extra-bold-ultra-black-fonts/), compiled by Stewf.

Thanks Florian :) thats really useful
